author: Flame442
install_msg:
Thanks for installing stocks. Commands are all under the group command `[p]stocks`.

You will need to follow the install guide in order to get an API key to use this cog. The guide can be found at <https://github.com/Flame442/FlameCogs/blob/master/stocks/setup.md>.

This cog assumes the bank is set to be a global bank, if your bank is guild-specific, users will be able to transfer credits between guilds using this cog.
name: Stocks
short: Buy and sell stocks with bot currency.
description: Buy and sell real world stocks at live prices Red currency. Stocks are bought at a ratio of 100 credits per $1, and change in value with the real world stock price. This cog requires an API integration to fetch the current stock prices. Use [p]stocks to buy!
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores a user id in order to know what stocks have been purchased by each user. Data is only collected when a user directly interacts with the cog and its commands.
